actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-368.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3180, a bill to authorize certain supplemental appropriations for the Department of Energy for fiscal year 1979 and to make certain amendments relating to the administration of such Department.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3180 (Department of Energy funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3180, a bill to authorize certain supplemental appropriations for the Department of Energy for fiscal year 1979 and to make certain amendments relating to the administration of such Department.
